title: Kiss Me Hello
description: Sidonie Lindstrom's hands and heart are full—she's been uprooted from the urban life she loves, she's grieving for her brother while raising her foster son Luis, and she's trying to find a job with meaning. But her burdens feel lighter when she meets rural lawyer Mackenzie Knightley. Their attraction is powerful and unexpected. Life is perfect… until Sid learns that Mack hasn't been completely honest about his job. When problems arise with Luis' foster care situation, she must decide: can she trust Mack again, when she has so much more to lose?
author: Grace Burrowes
